mapper.select: SELECT review_num, user_name, title, contents, country, hits, rating, reg_date FROM review ORDER BY review_num DESC, reg_date DESC
SELECT review_num, user_name, title, contents, country, hits, rating, reg_date FROM review WHERE country=#{country} ORDER BY review_num DESC, reg_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review ( user_id, user_name, title, contents, country, rating, reg_date ) VALUES ( #{user_id}, #{user_name}, #{title}, #{contents}, #{country}, #{rating}, NOW() )
mapper.update: UPDATE review SET hits=hits+1 WHERE review_num=#{review_num}
UPDATE review SET title=#{title}, contents=#{contents}, rating=#{rating}, reg_date=NOW() WHERE review_num = #{review_num}
